scripts.dev:build: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down -v && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml build --no-cache && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up
scripts.prod:build: docker-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml down -v && docker-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml build --no-cache && docker-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml up
